Jim asked for other opinions so here's mine. I thought Tenbo as well 
from the look of the plate, I think armourer work the plate metal 
would be "richer". The heavy, punched look of this fits with Tenbo 
work I have seen in spite of the lack of an identifiable "hot-stamp."
-t
